DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare time success rate four intubation device cardiopulmonary scenario without chest compression standardize pediatric manikin model .
DOC.detailed_description: Emergency airway management resuscitation critical skill emergency medicine . According European Resuscitation Council ( ERC ) guideline resuscitation 2010 , endotracheal intubation ( ETI ) consider gold standard resuscitation .
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent participate study minimum 1 year work experience emergency medicine experience emergency medical personnel ( paramedic , nurse , physician ) meet criterion wrist low back disease
